sentences.en: For many centuries, the Jade Buddha has protected my people.
sentences.cn: 几个世纪以来, 这个玉佛保护我的人民.

sentences.en: He has kept the figure of Buddha for luck.
sentences.cn: 为了图吉利他一直保存着这尊佛像.

sentences.en: Mara urged the former course, but the Buddha chose the latter, on the advice of Brahma.
sentences.cn: 摩拉力劝他选择前一条路, 但是佛祖听从了众生之本梵天的劝告,选择了后者.

sentences.en: Several women knelt down before the statue of Buddha and prayed.
sentences.cn: 几个妇女跪在佛像前祈祷.

sentences.en: The Buddha was amiable and enlightened.

The Giant Stone Buddha at Leshan Mountain in Sichuan Province of China, carved in the Tang Dynasty ( 618 A . D . - 907 A . D. ) , is 71 metres high , making it the largest statue of Buddha in the world.
sentences.cn: 中国四川的乐山大佛是世界上最大的佛像雕刻.它高达71米, 修建于唐代.

sentences.en: The ivory Buddha carved by Shen Weizhong, a contemporary Chinese sculptor, is the world's smallest piece of sculpture, its size being just four - fifths that of a grain of rice.
sentences.cn: 中国当代雕刻工艺师沈为众雕刻的象牙佛像是世界上最小的雕刻.这个象牙佛像只有一粒米的 五分之四 大.

sentences.en: The object of great interest at the Temple was a large marble tower built in memory of Buddha.
sentences.cn: 这处庙宇最引人注目的是一座为纪念佛陀而修建的宏伟的大理石塔。

sentences.en: The three top terraces contain about 400 statues of the Buddha beneath bell - shaped coverings.
sentences.cn: 三个最高的圆台容纳了约400个身披 喇叭形 斗篷的佛陀.

sentences.en: Therefore, the Buddha said that all living beings must eat to live.
sentences.cn: 是故佛说一切众生皆依食住.

sentences.en: They knelt before the image of Buddha.
They knelt before the image of the Buddha.
They represented the Buddha as the saviour from almost unlimited torment.
sentences.cn: 他们推尊佛陀为无边苦难的救主.

sentences.en: Who then is Jesus or Buddha or any other that many perceive as god?
sentences.cn: 那么,谁是耶稣或佛陀(Buddha)或者许多人所觉察为神的任何其他?

trans.tran_en: Buddha is the title given to Gautama Siddhartha, the religious teacher and founder of Buddhism
